intro.text: Hey there! I'm Gutty, your GUTS hackathon buddy. Choose your project:

fail_wrong_choice.text: Imagine choosing this over the best project ever lol You just lost to literal bots. Try again!

scene_setup.text: Nice choice! Let's set up your environment. Pip or Conda?

scene_framework.text: We'll use Django! Its fast, scalable, and sounds fancy. Ready to code?

fail_lazy.text: Hackathons aren't for the weak. Back to work!
